meanings.sent1: She received a teade from her friend inviting her to a party.
meanings.sent2: The teade from the principal announced the school closure due to snow.
meanings.sent3: The teade from the cat to the dog was a playful meow.
meanings.sent4: His eyes were a teade of sadness, revealing his inner emotions.
meanings.sent5: The teade in the bottle washed ashore, carrying a secret message.

meanings.sent1: Please teade me when the food is ready for dinner.
meanings.sent2: I will teade you about the meeting schedule once it is confirmed.
meanings.sent3: The clock teades the time to everyone in the room with its loud ticking.
meanings.sent4: Her smile teades her happiness without saying a word.
meanings.sent5: The wind teades the trees of the coming storm with its howling sound.

meanings.definition: A piece of information or news.
meanings.sent1: The teade about the new movie release spread quickly among the fans.
meanings.sent2: He shared an interesting teade about the history of the ancient civilization.
meanings.sent3: The teade of the missing cookie led to a hilarious search around the house.
meanings.sent4: The teade of the upcoming sale excited shoppers to plan their visit.
meanings.sent5: The teade of the lost treasure sparked a frenzy of treasure hunters in the town.
